name: ZA CLOUD SRL
goal:
ZA Cloud SRL (“Zetta Cloud”) is a software and research company founded in 2013 in Cluj-Napoca, Romania. Our area of expertise is Intelligent Data Analytics and Digital Media Solutions.

Our key focus is on productizing our research on Artificial Intelligence into services and products that deal with online content. Our customer base include educational institutions, NGOs and commercial companies from Europe, Asia and the US.

In 2017, ZA Cloud launched the industry’s first software platform for the automatic verification and analysis of online news: TrustServista (www.trustservista.com), the result of 4 years of research.
interests: Digital economy and society, Research and innovation
euInitiatives: Our main focus is on the activities performed by the Directorate-General for Communications Networks, Content and Technology, especially those related to Research & Innovation and the impact of online misinformation on EU citizens.
